    • Field Detail

      • ontologyPath

        public static java.lang.String ontologyPath
        The file path from where the ontology should be loaded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SemanticSearcher

        public SemanticSearcher(DatabaseManager dm)
        Main constructor, expects a databasemanager, which could be an empty one. Loads the ontology from the set path, and checks if it is consistent, kills program if not.
        Parameters:
        dm - DatabaseManager object, can be a brand new one.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubClasses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubClasses(java.lang.String className,
                                                      boolean direct)
        Searches ontology classesfor given className, and returns its descendants, if direct is True, then only direct ones, otherwise every descendant is returned.
        Parameters:
        className - name of ontology class to search for
        direct - return every descendant or only the direct ones
        Returns:
        A String list containing the fragment parts of the name of the descendants, or empty list if class is not found in ontoloy, or there are no descendants.

      • Search

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> Search(java.lang.String search)
        Calls the other Search method with expandSearch=true.
        Parameters:
        search -
        Returns:
        A String set containing the results to the search.
        See Also:
        Search(String search, boolean expandSearch)

      • Search

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> Search(java.lang.String search,
                                              boolean expandSearch)
        Searches for the given search argument and also its descendants in the ontology if expandSearch is set to True. Uses getSubClasses method. Every entry in the returned String set contains the appid and title of a game, separated by the SEPARATOR in DatabaseManager E.g. 470_Dota2
        Parameters:
        search - Tag to search for.
        expandSearch - If true also includes descendants of Tag in ontology in the search.
        Returns:
        A String set containing the results to the search.
